CustomField.formula:
IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA',"https://aspect.co.uk","https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it")& "/book-now/?id="&Id& "&acc="& Id & "&acn="& Account_Reference__c & "&exc="& IF(ISBLANK(Voucher_Code__c),"Yes","")& "&fn="&SUBSTITUTE( First_Name__c , " ", "%20") & "&ln="&SUBSTITUTE( Last_Name__c , " ", "%20") & "&ema="& Email__c & "&pho="& SUBSTITUTE(Phone," ","") &
"&as="&SUBSTITUTE( TEXT(AccountSource), " ", "%20") & "&bvc="& Voucher_Code__c
CustomField.label: Book Online URL
